name: Pistachio Cream Pie
author: MARBALET
summary: This pie has a walnut crust and two uncooked layers--cream cheese and pudding. It's made in a 9x13-inch baking dish.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
2 (3 ounce) packages instant pistachio pudding mix
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Combine the flour, walnuts, and butter and mix well
Press the mixture into the bottom of a 9 x 13 inch pan
Bake in the preheated oven until the nuts are fragrant and the crust is lightly browned, 20 to 30 minutes
Mix together the cream cheese, vanilla, confectioners' sugar, and 1 cup whipped topping
Beat well, and spread the filling over the cooled crust
Mix the instant pudding with milk until thick
Spread the pudding over the cream cheese layer
Top with remaining whipped topping, sprinkle with nuts, and decorate with maraschino cherries
